Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a string telephone device that connects two students over a distance.
The student can show how the string telephone uses sound to communicate information.
The student can portray specific features that allow sound to travel from one student to another through the string.
The student can incorporate only the given materials in their illustration of the string telephone.
The student can depict a successful exchange of information between the students using the string telephone.
The student can explain how the string telephone helps people communicate over long distances in their drawing.
